definition: to fire/to discharge/to release (fireworks, smokescreen, poison gas, virus etc)
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: It will take place on the day of the Lantern Festival on the Yanshui Junior High School athletic field.
sentences.chinese: 这些活动将在元宵节当天于盐水国中操场进行施放。

sentences.english: People release sky lanterns to celebrate the Lantern Festival in Pingsi District, New Taipei City on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 民众上周六在新北市平溪区平溪国中施放天灯庆元宵。

sentences.english: But base and crafty cowards, are like the arrow that flieth in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 不过卑怯而狡猾的懦夫则往往想要暗中施放的冷箭。

sentences.english: Tear-gas bombs were set off to break up the crowds.
sentences.chinese: 为驱散人群施放了催泪弹。

sentences.english: Human and succubus hybrids can cast haste and slow.
sentences.chinese: 人类和女妖的混血儿可以施放加速和减速魔法。

sentences.english: Reduced cast time of Scepter of Destruction from 5 seconds to 3.
sentences.chinese: 毁灭权杖的冲击波的施放时间从5秒降至3秒。

sentences.english: Players can now cast item targetable spells on items that are in your action bar.
sentences.chinese: 玩家现在可以在动作条中点击物品来施放一些法术。

sentences.english: Applying some bacterial fertilizer to the soil can help it absorb the nutritious matter.
sentences.chinese: 适量施放细菌肥料能促进土壤对养份的吸收。

sentences.english: Base and crafty cowards, are like the arrow that shoots in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 卑怯而狡猾的懦夫则往往想要暗中施放的冷箭。

sentences.english: Watch your aggro every time he does a meteor.
sentences.chinese: 每当他施放贼星时注重看你的愤恨。

sentences.english: Shamans ? Human and succubus hybrids can cast haste and slow.
sentences.chinese: 人类和魅魔的混血儿可以施放加速和减速魔法。

sentences.english: This is also an instinctive behavior to send out pheromones to a potential mate.
sentences.chinese: 这也是向潜在雄性施放性外激素的本能行为。

sentences.english: No. Casting Zombie on a Zombified character should cancel the status.
sentences.chinese: 施放僵尸魔法可以解除角色的僵尸状态。

sentences.english: Also no longer will heal summoned Snakes from Hunter's Snake Trap.
sentences.chinese: 施放时不会补猎人毒蛇陷阱昭唤出来的蛇。

sentences.english: Purge's (Power Shaman) casting time changed from 1s to 0s.
sentences.chinese: 威力萨满祭司净化的施放时间由1秒调整为0秒。

sentences.english: He can fire off spells all day and never get tired.
sentences.chinese: 进入魔井的人可以不停歇施放魔法而不会感到疲惫。

definition: to implement the law/to perform sorcery
to use fully/to put to use
to throw sth a long distance/to hurl/to throw at/to throw (dice etc)/to flip (a coin)
